faqs.question: What is BCT?
faqs.answer: BCT (Bone Correction Technique) is a specialized method for correcting spinal issues and improving overall health.

faqs.question: How can I book an appointment?
faqs.answer: You can book an appointment by contacting our therapists directly through the contact details provided in the therapist directory.

faqs.question: Are the courses available online?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer both online and in-person courses. Please check our courses section for more details.
